#### Resource Distribution Table (RDT)
The `r prime_vs_sub` shall prepare and submit the "Resource Distribution Table (RDT)" in accordance with CDRL `r RDT_CDRL_numb`. The "Resource Distribution Table (RDT)" identifies the value of work assigned to the Contractor and its subcontractors by for each WBS element listed in Attachment `r CSDR_plan_attch_numb` - CSDR Plan, and is the primary means of identifying which subcontractors qualify for CSDR flow down reporting.
